description: Navigate a treacherous castle filled with firebars and lava pits in this precision platformer.
rationale: This game focuses on the high-difficulty 'Castle' levels of classic platformers. It targets players who enjoy tight hitboxes, rhythmic obstacle patterns, and physics-based jumping challenges. It serves as an excellent environment for RL agents to learn timing and spatial awareness.
details: The game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer set in a castle environment. The player controls a character that must reach the axe at the end of the level. Key elements include: 1. Firebars: Rotating lines of fire balls that rotate at fixed speeds. 2. Lava Pits: Instant death zones if the character falls in. 3. Moving Platforms: Horizontal and vertical oscillating platforms. 4. Boss (Bowser-lite): A static enemy at the end that jumps and throws projectiles at fixed intervals. The game uses a 16x16 grid-based collision system with gravity and acceleration physics.

technical_specs.state_space: Player(x, y, vx, vy), Obstacles[(type, x, y, state)], Distance to goal

how_to_build: uv venv && uv pip install pygame
how_to_stop: kill -9 $(pgrep -f 'python main.py') or press ESC in the game window
how_to_play: Goal: Reach the axe at the far right of the stage. Scoring: +10 points for every meter moved right, +1000 for completing the level, -500 for death. Controls: Left Arrow to move left, Right Arrow to move right, Spacebar to jump. Avoid touching red fire particles and falling into the floor gaps.
